Jotunn was unexpectedly impressed. He hadn't thought of a strike.

Jotunn: And what would we use to strike? Rocks? Big Rocks? Even I
don't have the right kind of ammo for that objective... unless you do,
Perseus...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Spire:
> 
> "Any Predacon with little brain could do it... with the help of the
big 'T'..."said the femme with a decil smile
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: rm2kmidi 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Monday, October 03, 2005 6:23 PM
>   Subject: Re: Leaders Meeting
> 
> 
>   "I think we need to do some sort of strategic strike.  Either bomb
one of their bases, or kidnap one of their leaders.  Then their plans
might be slowed down.  Do any of you have anyone who is especially
good at interrogation?" 
> 
>   Perseus didn't like the idea of war, but if they had to do
something, he didn't want to needlessly waste lives in some blunt and
thoughtless aggression.
